item.title: Using Rails I18n translations to solve dynamic content issues
item.description: Last week during my main work contract I had been tasked with doing some would-be trivial content updates to a section of a client application. Content updates would normally involve hopping into a view changing some images or text and re-deploying. This particular section though is a little more complex then that and way more complex then it should be. The Setup This particular section of the application has rotating content.
